blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all Abelian group operations.

blocks.name: df-ablo
blocks.content: Define the class of all Abelian group operations. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: isablo
blocks.content: The predicate "is an Abelian (commutative) group operation." (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isablo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cablo, cgr, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wral(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))), wceq(crn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl6eqr(crn(cv(hs0)), c1, crn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, crn(cv(hs0)), c1, wral(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  raleq(s1, crn(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  df-ablo(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  diff.crn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.crn.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm isablo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ AbelOp ↔(c0 ∈ GrpOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0)))))
  ⊣ c1 = ran(c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cablo, cgr, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))))
  bitrd(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))))
  syl(hs0 = c0, (∀(s0 ∈ ran(hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))), ran(hs0)= c1)
  syl6eqr(ran(hs0), c1, ran(c0), hs0 = c0)
  rneq(hs0, c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, ran(hs0), c1, ∀(s1 ∈ ran(hs0),(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0)))
  raleq(s1, ran(hs0), c1, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0))
  2ralbidv(s0, s1, c1, c1, hs0 = c0, (s0[hs0]s1)=(s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))
  eqeq12d((s0[hs0]s1), (s1[hs0]s0), (s0[c0]s1), (s1[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s1, s0)
  df-ablo(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgr)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))))
  diff.crn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ablogrpo
blocks.content: An Abelian group operation is a group operation. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ablocom
blocks.content: An Abelian group operation is commutative. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablocom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1)))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1)), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cablo), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  isablo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1)), wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, c1)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), co(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cv(hs1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c0)
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, c1), co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, c0)
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c3, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(co(c1, c0, c3), co(c3, c0, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablocom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AbelOp ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c0]c3)=(c3[c0]c1))
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c0)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ AbelOp, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c0]c3)=(c3[c0]c1))
  syl5com(c0 ∈ AbelOp, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c0]c3)=(c3[c0]c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs1[c0]hs0))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ AbelOp, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs1[c0]hs0))), c0 ∈ GrpOp)
  isablo(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (hs0[c0]hs1)=(hs1[c0]hs0), (c1[c0]c3)=(c3[c0]c1), (c1[c0]hs1)=(hs1[c0]c1))
  eqeq12d((hs0[c0]hs1), (hs1[c0]hs0), (c1[c0]hs1), (hs1[c0]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c0, hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, hs1, c0)
  eqeq12d((c1[c0]hs1), (hs1[c0]c1), (c1[c0]c3), (c3[c0]c1), hs1 = c3)
  oveq2(hs1, c3, c1, c0)
  oveq1(hs1, c3, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[c0]hs1)=(hs1[c0]c1))
  diff.hs1.w((c1[c0]c3)=(c3[c0]c1))
}

blocks.name: ablo32
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablo32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cablo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), co(c1, c0, co(c3, c0, c4)), co(c1, c0, co(c4, c0, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cablo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, co(c3, c0, c4), co(c4, c0, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cablo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c0, c4), co(c4, c0, c3)))
  ablocom(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cablo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), co(c1, c0, co(c3, c0, c4))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cablo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), co(c1, c0, co(c4, c0, c3))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  ablogrpo(c0)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cgr), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), co(c1, c0, co(c4, c0, c3))), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ancomb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablo32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ AbelOp ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c0]c3)[c0]c4)=((c1[c0]c4)[c0]c3))
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c1[c0]c3)[c0]c4), ((c1[c0]c4)[c0]c3), (c1[c0](c3[c0]c4)), (c1[c0](c4[c0]c3)), (c0 ∈ AbelOp ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, c0, (c3[c0]c4), (c4[c0]c3), (c0 ∈ AbelOp ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ AbelOp, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c0]c4)=(c4[c0]c3))
  ablocom(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  sylan(c0 ∈ AbelOp, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c1[c0]c3)[c0]c4)=(c1[c0](c3[c0]c4)), c0 ∈ GrpOp)
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylan(c0 ∈ AbelOp, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c1[c0]c4)[c0]c3)=(c1[c0](c4[c0]c3)), c0 ∈ GrpOp)
  ablogrpo(c0)
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ GrpOp, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c1[c0]c4)[c0]c3)=(c1[c0](c4[c0]c3)), (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3ancomb(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  grpoass(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
}

thm ablo4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, c0, c5)), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, co(c3, c0, c5))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c0))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, c0, c5)), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, co(c3, c0, c5))))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, c0, c5)), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, co(c3, c0, c5)), co(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), c0, c5), co(co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), c0, c5), wa(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))))
  oveq1d(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), c0, c5, co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))))

  simprll(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simprlr(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simprrl(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  ablo32(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), c0, c5), co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, c0, c5))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, c4), c0, c5), co(co(c1, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, c0, c5))), w3a(wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c3), c2))
  grpocl(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  simprrl(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  grpoass(c0, co(c1, c0, c3), c2, c4, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cablo), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, c3), c0, c5), co(co(c1, c0, c4), c0, co(c3, c0, c5))), wcel(c0, cgr))
  ablogrpo(c0)

  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c4), c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantrrr(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c4), c2))
  adantrlr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c4), c2))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c0, c4), c2))
  grpocl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  simprlr(wcel(c0, cgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simprrr(wcel(c0, cgr), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  grpoass(c0, co(c1, c0, c4), c2, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: isabloi
blocks.content: Properties that determine an Abelian group operation. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isabloi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(c0, cablo)
  -| wcel(c0, cgr)
  -| wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cablo), wcel(c0, cgr), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  isablo(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  grporn(c1, c0)
}

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ∈ AbelOp, c0 ∈ GrpOp, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))))
  rgen2a(s0, s1, c1, (s0[c0]s1)=(s1[c0]s0))
  isablo(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  grporn(c1, c0)
}
